== Kayakkodi (627346) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kayakkodi is a village in the [[Vadakara]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 2814 hectares and harbouring 5664 households with total population of 24578 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Vadakara]] is at a distance of 32 km. Male population is 11627 and female population is 12951. Scheduled Caste Population is 612 and Scheduled Tribes population is 54. Census Location Code of the village is 627346<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 20211 (82.23%)
* Literate male population: 9950 (85.58%)
* Literate female population: 10261 (79.23%)
